basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Brandon Wolf. I am a Navy Veteran of 5 years as an avionics Electronics Technician. I did one deployment on the USS Harry S Truman where I led a team of 10 sailors to the repair of 422 aviation items. After the military, I attended Microsoft Software and System academy where I learned how to be a cloud administrator on Azure. It was during that class I learned the use of backend development and I enrolled in Code Fellows Coding Bootcamp to expand my knowledge. I am learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python. I have a growth mindset and I am not attached to any one place!

projects.title: Mental Health Awareness Questionnaire
projects.description: A project that I felt very passionate about. I work with fellow class members at Code Fellows to mkae an app that generates a chart from a user input questionnaire.

projects.title: March for the 22
projects.description: Created a veteran website highlighting the amount of veterans who take their own life.

projects.title: Chocolate Pizza
projects.description: This was my first project to style a webpage with HTML and CSS. I have learned alot since!
